body.name: VIGASZEN Gel Seat Cushion with Non-Slip Cover for Long Sitting, Gel Cushion to Relieve Lumbar, Hip, Sciatica, Coccyx Pain, Cool and Breathable Gel Chair Cushion for Office Car Home Wheelchair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 52 mins
features: 【PAIN RELIEF】: Our gel chair cushion is ergonomically designed to fit your body shape, evenly distribute your weight, improve blood circulation and relieve lumbar, hip, sciatica, coccyx pain.

【COOL & BREATHABLE】: The gel seat cushion adopts double-layer honeycomb design with many breathable vents to prevent sweat and keep you cool all the time. Compared with foam seat cushions, the excellent breathability and heat dissipation of our gel chair pad makes your seat more comfortable.

【SOFT & NOT DEFORM】: Our gel seat cushion for long sitting is characterized by highly elastic gel material so you will feel soft sitting on it . When stretched and squeezed, it will restore to its original shape quickly. More long-lasting and durable than traditional cushions.

【NON-SLIP & WATERPROOF】: Our gel seat pad is made of high-quality gel. It's waterproof so you can use in bathing, swimming, boating, kayaking, or outdoor patio chairs. The black non-slip cover can prevent the seat cushion from shifting. Zipper design can ensure the cover to be removed easily and it can be machine washable.
【WIDE USE】: The gel cushion is suitable for a variety of occassions that require sedentary use, such as car, office, home, school, wheelchair, travel and so on.
body.description: VIGASZEN Gel Seat Cushion with Non-slip Cover for Long Sitting, Gel Cushion to Relieve Lumbar, Hip, Sciatica, Coccyx Pain, Cool and Breathable Gel Chair Cushion for Office Car Home Wheelchair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got a new desk chair for gaming last year and ever since I have been struggling with comfort of the seat cushion. It's very dense foam and not particularly comfortable on it's own.I ordered this to try and correct that problem and I was not disappointed at all.Adding this gel cushion to my chair immediately revolutionized the comfort level of my chair and I am thoroughly pleased with everything about it.For the price of it, it's very very worthwhile.5 stars, if you need a cushion for a chair or anything, give this a try and I sincerely doubt that you will be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used it to make a worn, saggy chair more comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm on the fence about this. When I sit on it there's no cushiony give. I'll try it underneath a cushion like another reviewer tried, but I'm disappointed because I've been hearing good things about honeycomb gel for about twenty or so years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Waffles so good, she ordered another one to go with her peaches!
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd such similar Waffle-style Gel seat pad that we have ordered. My wife loved the one I had previously ordered for myself, and after trying it herself on and off for a few times, she decided that she loved it enough, to want me to order her one too!She has 2 years of Degree studying coming up from this fall, and that is going to mean a lot of desk-time for her. So, this will go a long way to making those study hour a lot more comfortable.The removeable cover makes it easy to take care of and keep clean too.She loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mixed reviews from wheelchair-bound mom
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my mother, who spends a significant amount of time in a wheelchair. She isn't sure she likes it because of the honeycomb gel. The honeycombs collapse when you sit on the cushion, but of course they don't collapse straight down. They lean to one side, which makes her lean to that side a bit, and she says the sensation of sitting on the honeycomb is "unsettling." I tried it out on a regular chair, and I see what she's talking about. I didn't dislike it as much as she did, but I also didn't sit on it as long. Mom said it would be a good base pad with a soft, and more conventional pillow-type pad on top of it so you don't feel the honeycomb. 3.5/5 for us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion adds a very comfortable layer of support to office chairs! The design is particularly good at staying ventilated and cool unlike memory foam I’ve tried before. The silicone mesh stays firm enough to support you while sitting, but has enough play to provide a comfortable experience for prolonged sitting. The mesh sits inside a zipper closing bag, with gripping material on the bottom. It feels high quality and is much cheaper than paying for a name brand, similar color solution. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Surface is bumpy to sit on for any length of time
reviews.reviewText: This gel cushion (with the added cover on) adds some cushioning, but it wasn't comfortable for me. Maybe I'm oversensitive, but I could feel the gel cutouts of the cushion when sitting for very long.It worked much better for me when I placed it under another cushion that has a softer flat surface. The two together were quite comfortable.Maybe you will find this to be useful and not even notice the bumpy surface!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars School work or long video game playing is much more comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I got this gel seat cushion for my 16 year old son. He uses it in his desk chair, in the car on long journeys, and even when go to a football stadium on the bleachers. He has a very thin, bony frame and needs some extra cushion and this gel seat cushion gives him that. He says it is very comfortable and amazingly doesn’t sink in when sitting on it.The washable cover is very nice to have to keep the cushion clean and protected. It has grippers on the bottom and a good zipper.
